knimeNode.name: Alpha Miner (Event Log)
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node applies the Alpha Miner to discover a Petri net from an event log.

fullDescription.intro: This node wraps the ProM's plug-in "Alpha Miner" from the package AlphaMiner. It implements the Alpha Miner to discover a Petri net from an event log.
fullDescription.option: The attribute to be used as an event classifier.
The Alpha miner variant to be applied. Currently, five variants are supported: Alpha, Alpha+, Alpha++, Alpha#, and AlphaR.
